nvn.h ファイル

C headers for the NVN 3D API. [詳解]

#include <stddef.h>

マクロ定義

#define NVN_API_MAJOR_VERSION   53
 Major version of the NVN API.
 
#define NVN_API_MINOR_VERSION   209
 Minor version of the NVN API.
 
#define NVN_FALSE   0x0000
 Boolean condition with a value of false.
 
#define NVN_MEMORY_POOL_STORAGE_ALIGNMENT   0x1000
 Required base address alignment for app-specified memory used to back memory pools. [詳解]
 
#define NVN_MEMORY_POOL_STORAGE_GRANULARITY   0x1000
 Required size alignment for app-specified memory used to back memory pools. [詳解]
 
#define NVN_STORAGE_CLASS_BUFFER   0x100
 Fixed storage class used for memory mappings of buffers, buffer textures, and linear textures. [詳解]
 
#define NVN_TRUE   0x0001
 Boolean condition with a value of true.
 
#define NVN_WAIT_TIMEOUT_MAXIMUM   0xFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFULL
 When waiting on NVNsync objects, wait indefinitely until the sync object is signaled. [詳解]
 
#define NVN_WAIT_TIMEOUT_NONE   0x0ULL
 When waiting on NVNsync objects, do not wait if the sync object has not yet been signaled. [詳解]
